CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 7, 1945, pg. 5, reads: "Guests Feted - Mr. and Mrs. Clarence D. Adams and son, of Knoxville, Tenn., and Miss Elizabeth Adams of Washington, D. C., were recent guests at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Dewey S. Adams of 717 Bryn Mawr Road. The visitors were entertained royally during their stay here. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group, including Clarence D. Adams, Mrs. Adams, and Elizabeth Adams gathered in home of Dewey S. Adams with pictures of Christ and boxer on wall, 717 Bryn Mawr Road, Upper Hill District
